addChild.note: Si su hijo nació prematuramente, ingrese la fecha en que nació, pero use la lista de verificación con base en la edad corregida. Si la edad corregida se encuentra entre dos listas de verificación, use la de la edad menor.
addChild.noteClick: Haga clic aquí para obtener información sobre cómo calcular la edad corregida.
addChild.title: Agregar un niño

appointment.emailChildsSummary: Enviar el resumen del niño por correo electrónico
appointment.title: Appointment

childSummary.changeYourAnswerTitle: Change your answer to this milestone to
childSummary.message1:
A continuación se incluyen las respuestas que ingresó para {{name}}.

Haga clic en "Enviar por correo electrónico" para enviarse el resumen de los indicadores de su hijo a usted o a otros proveedores de cuidados. Haga clic en "Mostrar al médico" para compartir un resumen con el médico de su hijo durante la visita.

Si tiene alguna inquietud o seleccionó la opción "Todavía no" o "No estoy seguro" para alguno de los indicadores del desarrollo, hable con el médico de su hijo, muéstrele el resumen, pidale una evaluación del desarrollo y consulte el sitio <0>cdc.gov/IntervenciónTemprana</0> para aprender más sobre los servicios que pueden ayudarlo. No espere. ¡Reaccionar promo puede tener un gran impacto! Para obtener más información, visite <1>cdc.gov/Preocupado</1>.
childSummary.title: Resumen de la {{age}} de {{name}}.

common.getStartedBtn: ¡Comenzar a seguir el desarrollo de su hijo!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.yellowTip: Si la edad de su hijo está entre dos de las listas de verificación de arriba, recibirá la lista de la edad menor.

info.aboutThisAppText:
This app was developed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s “Learn the Signs. Act Early.” program (<0>www.cdc.gov/ActEarly</0>) with contribution from Dr. Rosa Arriaga and students from the Computing for Good program at 
the Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA.

This app includes the following features to make tracking your child’s important developmental milestones easy and fun: 

<1>Add A Child</1> - enter personalized information about your child or multiple children

<1>Milestone Tracker</1> - track your child’s developmenal progress by looking for important milestones using an interactive, illustrated checklist
Milestone Photos and Videos - know what each milestone looks like so that you can better identify them in your own child

<1>Tips and Activities</1> - support your child’s development at every age
When to Act Early - know when it’s time to “act early” and talk with your child’s doctor about developmental concerns
Appointments - keep track of your child’s doctors’ appointments and get reminders about recommended developmental screenings

<1>Milestone Results</1> - get a summary of your child’s milestones to view, and share with or email to your child’s doctor and other important care providers
The use of this app is NOT a substitute for the use of validated, standardized devleopmental screening tools as recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics. 

For more information and free tools to help you track your child’s milestones, visit <2>www.cdc.gov/ActEarly</2>
info.drawerLabel: Información sobre la app y política de privacidad
info.privacyPolicyText: CDC does not collect or share any personal information that can be used to identify you or your child.
info.title: Info

milestoneChecklist.actEarlyMessage1: Si selecciona cualquiera de las opciones siguientes, es importante que reaccione pronto al hablar con el médico de su hijo y pedirle pruebas del desarrollo. No espere. ¡Reaccionar pronto puede tener un gran impacto! Para obtener más información, visite <0>www.cdc.gov/Concerned</0>
milestoneChecklist.actEarlyWarning: Puede que sea el momento de reaccionar pronto, hable con el médico.
milestoneChecklist.addANoteLong:
Notes will save automatically, 
enter them here.
milestoneChecklist.message1: La app Sigamos el Desarrollo tiene listas de verificación para las edades de 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 y 18 meses, y de los 2 a los 5 años.
milestoneChecklist.message2: Si la edad de su hijo está entre dos listas de verificación, complete la lista de la edad menor.
milestoneChecklist.quickViewMessage: A continuación se incluye una descripción breve do todos los indicadores del desarrollo que alcanzan la mayoria de los niños para la edad de {{milestone}} meses.

notifications.appointment1DayBeforeBody: {{name}} has a doctor’s appointment tomorrow. Write down any concerns or questions you have and share them with the doctor. If this is a well-child checkup, also share {{hisHersTag}} milestone checklist. 📝
notifications.milestoneCompleteReminder: Some of {{name}}’s {{milestoneAgeFormatted}} milestones were marked ‘Not Yet’ or ‘Not Sure.’ Would you like to recheck those milestones?
notifications.nextMilestoneBirthdayNotificationBody: {{name}} is {{childAgeFormatted}} old 🎂! Complete {{hisHersTag}} {{milestoneAgeFormatted}} milestone checklist today!
notifications.recommendation1DayPassedBody: Acting early on missed milestones or other concerns can make a big difference. While each child develops differently, some differences can be a cause for concern. Set a doctor’s appointment to share {{name}}’s summary and ask for developmental screening. Don’t wait. 🗓
notifications.recommendation1weekPassedBody: You marked some of {{name}}’s milestones as Not Yet or marked a possible concern. Act Early by talking to {{hisHersTag}} doctor and ask for developmental screening.⚕️️
notifications.recommendation4weeksPassedBody: Did you make an appointment to talk with the doctor about {{name}}’s milestone summary? Don’t wait. Acting early can make a big difference. ⚠️
notifications.tipsAndActivitiesBody: You asked to be reminded about tips and activities to help your child's development. Try one today! 💡
notifications.wellCheckUp5DaysAfterBirthday: {{name}} is due for {{hisHersTag}} {{milestoneAgeFormattedDashed}}-old well-child checkup soon. Complete {{hisHersTag}} checklist today to share with the doctor. 🩺
notifications.wellCheckUpNoChecklist: {{name}} is due for {{hisHersTag}} {{milestoneAgeFormattedDashed}}-old well-child checkup soon. Schedule this appointment and write down any developmental concerns or questions to share with the doctor 📝.
notifications.wellCheckUpSR1: {{name}} is due for a {{milestoneAgeFormattedDashed}}-old well-child checkup soon. Share {{hisHersTag}} checklist and ask about developmental screening—it’s recommended for ALL children at this age.⚕️️
notifications.wellCheckUpSR2: {{name}} is due for a {{milestoneAgeFormattedDashed}}-old well-child checkup soon. Share {{hisHersTag}} checklist and ask about developmental and autism screening - recommended for ALL children this age. 👨‍⚕

onboardingInfo.list_1: Comenzar a hacer un seguimiento de los indicadores del desarrollo
onboardingInfo.list_2: Ver el resumen de los indicadores de su hijo
onboardingInfo.welcome:
Is your child’s
development on track?
onboardingInfo.welcome1p:
From brith to age 5, your child should reach milestones in how he or she plays, learns, speaks, acts, and moves. 
Track your child’s development and act early if you have a concern.
onboardingInfo.welcome2p: La aplicacion "sigamos el desarollo" de los CDC hace que el seguimiento del desarrollo de su hijo sea fácil y divertido

onboardingParentProfile.territoryInfo:
Se le pide su estado y territorio para saber dónde se está usando la app Sigamos el Desarrollo.

No se recoge ni comparte ninguna información personal que se pueda usar para identificarlo a usted o su hijo.

revisit.description:
A summary of your responses and other helpful information are below.

Share this with your child’s doctor and other care providers. Remember, if you ever become concerned about Covey’s development, talk with the doctor and ask for developmental screening and services that can help make a big difference. Don’t wait.

<0>ACT EARLY by talking with Mina’s doctor right away about:</0>
revisit.notYetText: Ask the doctor for developmental screening and about services that can help. Remember, acting early on concerns and missed milestones can make a big difference for Mina. Don’t wait. Learn more about how to help your child at: <0>cdc.gov/Concerned</0>
revisit.thankYouText:
Thank you for using
CDC’s Milestone Tracker
App for tracking {{childName}}'s
milestones.
revisit.thankYouText2:
Thank you again for using CDC’s Milestone Tracker App!

Learn more about developmental milestones and acting early on concerns at <0>cdc.gov/ActEarly.</0>
revisit.timeToCelebrate: Take time to CELEBRATE Covey having reached these important milestones:
revisit.yellowTip: You know {{childName}} best. If {{heSheTag}} is missing milestones or you ever become concerned about {{hisHersTag}} development, talk with the doctor, share your concerns, and ask for developmental screening.

tipsAndActivities.subtitle: Puede ayudar a que su bebé / niño aprenda y crezca. Hablen, lean, canten y jueguen juntos todos los días. A continuación se presentan algunas actividades para disfrutar con su bebé / niño {{childAge}} hoy
tipsAndActivities.title: Consejos y actividades
